description: Time-of-Flight (ToF) sensor. Arduino library for the ST VL53L1X sensor (https://www.st.com/en/imaging-and-photonics-solutions/vl53l1x.html). Wraps the  Pololu VL43L1X library for Arduino  (https://github.com/pololu/vl53l1x-arduino).
name: vl53l1x-time-of-flight

@/example-output-to-oled.description: Example demonstrating output of range measurement to an OLED screen.

By6JbE80w.content:
The default I²C address of the VL53L1X device is 29h. You can change the I²C address of the device using the set-address node. If the device is reset the I²C address will return to the default. In this example we use a relay to cut the power to the VL53L1X to reset it, before initialization. If we were to reset the microcontroller board without resetting the VL53L1X we would only be able to run the patch once. 

On the first run the address of the VL53L1X would be set to 30h. If the microcontroller board was then reset, the patch would run again from the beginning. However, if the VL53L1X continued to be powered on, then it would retain its new address of 30h. Initialization would fail on the 2nd run of the patch, because the init node expects the VL53L1X to have the default address of 29h, but it would actually be 30h.

Polulu breakout boards for the VL53L1X have an XSHUT pin which enables them to be toggled on and off to facilitate address setting (see https://forum.pololu.com/t/vl53l1x-cant-change-address/18270). However the Pimoroni breakout board that I have used to develop this library doesn't have an XSHUT pin (or equivalent), so I had to use a relay to toggle it off and on.

@/example-set-address.description: Patch to demonstrate setting of I²C address.

@/example-test-configuration.description: Patch to test nodes used to set and get configuration options.

H1IN9d-C4.description: Patch for testing time-of-flight (ToF) sensor. Run in debug mode.

@/get-address.description: Read the I²C address of the VL53L1X.

HJZ19u42TE.description: Pulses on read of  I²C address.
HJZ19u42TE.label: DONE

@/get-distance-mode.description: Read current distance mode of VL53L1X.

ByYDjKZAE.label: DM

HJZbKp4h6E.description: Pulse on read of distance mode.
HJZbKp4h6E.label: DONE

SJzbFT436V.description: Update. Triggers read of distance mode.
SJzbFT436V.label: UPD

@/get-measurement-timing-budget.description: Read measurement timing budget of VL53L1X.

r1-HGlwnpN.description: Pulse on read of measurement timing budget.
r1-HGlwnpN.label: DONE

rkGHGlD3aE.description: Update. Triggers read of measurement timing budget.
rkGHGlD3aE.label: UPD

@/get-roi.description: Read dimensions of region of interest (ROI).

H10vprb6w.description: Width of ROI in single photon avalanche detectors (SPADs).
H10vprb6w.label: X

HkaK6H-TP.description: Height of ROI in single photon avalanche detectors (SPADs).
HkaK6H-TP.label: Y

SJuWCS-av.description: Pulse when dimensions of ROI have been read.
SJuWCS-av.label: DONE

Sycl6rbaD.description: Update. Trigger read of ROI dimensions.
Sycl6rbaD.label: UPD

@/get-timeout.description: Read current timeout setting of VL53L1X.

HkzfgBDn6E.description: Update. Triggers read of current timeout.
HkzfgBDn6E.label: UPD

HkOwz69p4.description: Trigger for initialization. Default is to initialize on boot.
HkOwz69p4.label: INIT

B1a1SK26N.description: Peak signal count rate (mega-counts per second).
B1a1SK26N.label: PSCR

SJQf6iCTE.label: STAT

@/set-address.description: Set I²C address of VL53L1X device.

@/set-distance-mode.description:
Set distance mode. The VL53L1X has three distance modes (DM): short, medium, and long.
Long distance mode allows the longest possible ranging distance of 4 m to be reached. However, this maximum ranging distance is impacted by ambient light.
Short distance mode is more immune to ambient light, but its maximum ranging distance is typically limited to 1.3 m.

BkGM8aBhaE.description: Update. Trigger for setting distance mode.
BkGM8aBhaE.label: UPD

HkWzLaShaE.description: Pulses when distance mode is set.
HkWzLaShaE.label: OK

@/set-measurement-timing-budget.description:
Set measurement timing budget. The VL53L1X timing budget can be set from 20 ms up to 1000 ms.
• 20 ms is the minimum timing budget and can be used only in Short distance mode.
• 33 ms is the minimum timing budget which can work for all distance modes.
• 140 ms is the timing budget which allows the maximum distance of 4 m (in the dark on a white chart) to be reached under Long distance mode
Increasing the timing budget increases the maximum distance the device can range and improves the repeatability error. However, average power consumption augments accordingly.

B1Mb4CwnaV.description: Update. Trigger for setting measurement timing budget.
B1Mb4CwnaV.label: UPD

SJcTJOnTV.description: Measurement timing budget (microseconds). N.B. units are microseconds not milliseconds.
SJcTJOnTV.label: MTB

r1ZbNRPn6V.description: Pulses when measurement timing budget is set.
r1ZbNRPn6V.label: OK

@/set-roi.description:
Set a region of interest (ROI). The ROI position is centered, only the ROI size can be changed. The full sensor (16x16 SPADs) provides a nominal
27 ° field of view (FoV). The FoV can be reduced to a minimum of 15 ° by setting the ROI to 4x4 SPADs. For further information please see: https://www.st.com/resource/en/application_note/dm00516219-using-the-programmable-region-of-interest-roi-with-the-vl53l1x-stmicroelectronics.pdf

Hk3GIlbTw.description: ROI height in single photon avalanche detectors (SPADs). Full height of sensor is 16 SPADS. Minimum height of ROI is 4 SPADs.
Hk3GIlbTw.label: Y

Sy-ZUx-6w.description: ROI width in single photon avalanche detectors (SPADs). Full width of sensor is 16 SPADS. Minimum width of ROI is 4 SPADs.
Sy-ZUx-6w.label: X

@/start-continuous.description: Start continuous ranging measurements, with the given inter-measurement period in milliseconds determining how often the sensor takes a measurement.

SJx7BV3TN.description: Pulse on start of continuous ranging.
SJx7BV3TN.label: DONE

SknOEV2aN.description: Inter-measurement period (milliseconds). This period should be at least as long as the measurement timing budget.
SknOEV2aN.label: IMP

ByQuf_E2aV.description: Update. Trigger for stopping continuous ranging.
ByQuf_E2aV.label: UPD

@/timeout-occurred.description: Did a timeout occur in one of the read functions since the last call to this node?

SyjD72-C4.description: Update. Trigger check if timeout occurred.
SyjD72-C4.label: UPD

BJxMnP-0V.description: Peak signal count rate (mega-counts per second).
BJxMnP-0V.label: PSCR

ByIZfnw-RV.label: STAT

HJf9cv-RN.description: Inter-measurement period (milliseconds). This period should be at least as long as the measurement timing budget.
HJf9cv-RN.label: IMP

rJEHaGLRD.label: ROI-X
rJEHaGLRD.description: ROI width in single photon avalanche detectors (SPADs). Full width of sensor is 16 SPADS. Minimum width of ROI is 4 SPADs.

BJYBaGUAP.label: ROI-Y
BJYBaGUAP.description: ROI height in single photon avalanche detectors (SPADs). Full height of sensor is 16 SPADS. Minimum height of ROI is 4 SPADs.
